body_html:
using volatile gives the following warning:

/home/amsha/Research/FoodClassification/models/test_torch.py:262: UserWarning: volatile was removed and now has no effect. Use `with torch.no_grad():` instead.

Anyhow, the problem doesn't exist anymore, even without volatile. Will update here if things change.
body:
using volatile gives the following warning: 
```
/home/amsha/Research/FoodClassification/models/test_torch.py:262: UserWarning: volatile was removed and now has no effect. Use `with torch.no_grad():` instead.
```

Anyhow, the problem doesn't exist anymore, even without `volatile`. Will update here if things change.
